overview: Video essay | HD | Color | 06:02 | Peru | 2021  A little girl is frightened when she sees workers leaving a factory in a movie theater. Later, perhaps to scare more children, she increases the production of optics for video. Do we win or lose with repetition? Perhaps it is too late to become unaccustomed to control.  PROJECT REALIZED FOR MUTA - Festival of Audiovisual Appropriation Sound artist: MICHAEL MAGÁN
tagline: PROJECT REALIZED FOR MUTA - Festival of Audiovisual Appropriation
title: Translucent repetition
